queries.name: Directors of movies starring Brad Pitt
Directors of movies starring Brad Pitt with their directors
People on DBpedia younger than Ruben Verborgh born in the same place
All common interests of Ruben V and Ruben T
queries.query:
SELECT ?interestName
WHERE {
  ruben:me foaf:topic_interest ?interest.
  rubent:me foaf:topic_interest ?interest.
  ?interest rdfs:label ?interestName.
  FILTER LANGMATCHES(LANG(?interestName),  "EN")
}

queries.name: All interests of Ruben
Directors of movies starring Brad Pitt
Find Anime TV series and their available streaming services
queries.query:
SELECT ?animeName ?providerName WHERE {
  ?stream a bow:Stream.
  ?stream bow:object ?anime.
  ?stream bow:providedBy ?provider.

  ?anime a schema:TVSeries .
  ?anime schema:name ?animeName .

  ?provider foaf:name ?providerName

  FILTER (lang(?animeName) = 'en')
}
LIMIT 10
